message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $10000 to you at a competitive rate.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $12000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to pay $10500 for it, which is a fair price considering its value to me.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. I am willing to consider your offer and propose a price of $11000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our respective positions and I believe it will be a fair deal for both of us.
